name: EducationalTalksDaily
0:
”Alexa, open Ted Talks Daily”
”Alexa, launch Ted Talks Daily”
”Alexa, start Ted Talks Daily”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ted talks daily
des:
Every day, this skill will play a new educational talk, with video, on your Echo Spot or Show. The talks are shorter in length, about 10-20 minutes, so perfect for watching over breakfast!

Just say, "Alexa, open Ted Talks Daily".

This skill is not official, nor endorsed by anyone at the TED organisation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
